snippet: Many vegan dishes, like fruit salad and peanut butter and jelly, are already beloved. However, the problem faced by many of us is in imagining less-traditional vegan dishes that are interesting and not challenging. Here are some more creative options...
lead_paragraph: Many vegan dishes, like fruit salad and peanut butter and jelly, are already beloved. However, the problem faced by many of us is in imagining less-traditional vegan dishes that are interesting and not challenging. Here are some more creative options to try.
